      • getNodeType

        public String getNodeType()
        Description copied from interface: Task
        Get the nodeType for if/when this task publishes on zookeeper.
        Specified by:
        getNodeType in interface Task
        Overrides:
        getNodeType in class AbstractTask
        Returns:
        the nodeType to use when publishing the server to zookeeper. null if the task doesn't expect to publish to zookeeper.

      • getQueryRunner

        public <T> QueryRunner<T> getQueryRunner(Query<T> query)
        Description copied from interface: Task
        Returns query runners for this task. If this task is not meant to answer queries over its datasource, this method should return null.
        Specified by:
        getQueryRunner in interface Task
        Overrides:
        getQueryRunner in class AbstractTask
        Type Parameters:
        T - query result type
        Returns:

      • isReady

        public boolean isReady(TaskActionClient taskActionClient)
                throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: Task
        Execute preflight actions for a task. This can be used to acquire locks, check preconditions, and so on. The actions must be idempotent, since this method may be executed multiple times. This typically runs on the coordinator. If this method throws an exception, the task should be considered a failure. This method must be idempotent, as it may be run multiple times per task.
        Parameters:
        taskActionClient - action client for this task (not the full toolbox)
        Returns:
        true if ready, false if not ready yet
        Throws:
        Exception - if the task should be considered a failure

      • run

        public TaskStatus run(TaskToolbox toolbox)
               throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: Task
        Execute a task. This typically runs on a worker as determined by a TaskRunner, and will be run while holding a lock on our dataSource and implicit lock interval (if any). If this method throws an exception, the task should be considered a failure.
        Parameters:
        toolbox - Toolbox for this task
        Returns:
        Some kind of finished status (isRunnable must be false).
        Throws:
        Exception - if this task failed
